languages.text: "Без тебя я не прошла бы свой путь. Потому скажу, не тая — я тоже рада биться с тобою плечом к плечу!"

traits.locale_text: "Без тебя я не прошла бы свой путь. Потому скажу, не тая — я тоже рада биться с тобою плечом к плечу!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
languages.original_text: "Без тебя я не прошла бы свой путь. Потому скажу, не тая — я тоже рада биться с тобою плечом к плечу!"

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I wouldn't have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果没有你，我根本无法抵达这条道路的终点。因此，我可以毫不掩饰地说，我很高兴能与你并肩作战！”
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"

traits.locale_text: “如果没有你，我根本无法抵达这条道路的终点。因此，我可以毫不掩饰地说，我很高兴能与你并肩作战！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No habría llegado al final de mi camino sin usted, de modo que no tengo por qué ocultar este sentimiento: ¡yo también me alegro de luchar a su lado!».
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"

traits.locale_text: «No habría llegado al final de mi camino sin usted, de modo que no tengo por qué ocultar este sentimiento: ¡yo también me alegro de luchar a su lado!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下がいなければ、この道の終わりまでたどり着くことはできなかっただろう。だから素直に、御身と肩を並べて戦えることを嬉しく思っているのです！」
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がいなければ、この道の終わりまでたどり着くことはできなかっただろう。だから素直に、御身と肩を並べて戦えることを嬉しく思っているのです！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ohne Euch hätte ich niemals das Ende meines Pfades erreicht. Ich sage das also, ohne es zu verbergen: Ich bin einfach nur froh, Schulter an Schulter mit Euch zu kämpfen!"
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"

traits.locale_text: "Ohne Euch hätte ich niemals das Ende meines Pfades erreicht. Ich sage das also, ohne es zu verbergen: Ich bin einfach nur froh, Schulter an Schulter mit Euch zu kämpfen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne serais jamais arrivée au bout de mon chemin sans vous et je vous le dis sans fard : je me réjouis moi aussi de me battre à vos côtés ! »
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne serais jamais arrivée au bout de mon chemin sans vous et je vous le dis sans fard : je me réjouis moi aussi de me battre à vos côtés ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sen olmasaydın yolumun sonuna ulaşamazdım. O nedenle hiç eğip bükmeden söyleyeceğim: Ben de seninle omuz omuza savaştığım için bir o kadar mutluyum."
languages.original_text: "I would not have reached the end of my path without you. So I say this without hiding it: I am just as glad to be fighting shoulder to shoulder with you!"
